sn12.18:4.2: Atha kho timbaruko paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.18:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn12.18:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho timbaruko paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.18:5.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sayaṅkataṃ sukhadukkhanti?
sn12.18:5.3: Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, paraṅkataṃ sukhadukkhanti?
sn12.18:5.5: Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca sukhadukkhanti?
sn12.18:5.7: Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ sukhadukkhanti?
sn12.18:5.9: Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, natthi sukhadukkhanti?
sn12.18:5.12: Tena hi bhavaṃ gotamo sukhadukkhaṃ na jānāti, na passatīti?
sn12.18:5.13: Na khvāhaṃ, timbaruka, sukhadukkhaṃ na jānāmi, na passāmi.
sn12.18:6.1: “‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sayaṅkataṃ sukhadukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṃ, timbarukā’ti vadesi.
sn12.18:6.2: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, paraṅkataṃ sukhadukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṃ, timbarukā’ti vadesi.
sn12.18:6.3: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, sayaṅkatañca paraṅkatañca sukhadukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṃ, timbarukā’ti vadesi.
sn12.18:6.4: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho gotama, asayaṅkāraṃ aparaṅkāraṃ adhiccasamuppannaṃ sukhadukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘mā hevaṃ, timbarukā’ti vadesi.
sn12.18:6.5: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho gotama, natthi sukhadukkhan’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na kho, timbaruka, natthi sukhadukkhaṃ;
sn12.18:6.7: ‘Tena hi bhavaṃ gotamo sukhadukkhaṃ na jānāti, na passatī’ti iti puṭṭho samāno ‘na khvāhaṃ, timbaruka, sukhadukkhaṃ na jānāmi, na passāmi.
sn12.18:6.10: Ācikkhatu ca me bhavaṃ gotamo sukhadukkhaṃ.
sn12.18:6.11: Desetu ca me bhavaṃ gotamo sukhadukkhan”ti.
sn12.18:7.1: “‘Sā vedanā, so vedayatī’ti kho, timbaruka, ādito sato ‘sayaṅkataṃ sukhadukkhan’ti evampāhaṃ na vadāmi.
sn12.18:7.2: ‘Aññā vedanā, añño vedayatī’ti kho, timbaruka, vedanābhitunnassa sato ‘paraṅkataṃ sukhadukkhan’ti evampāhaṃ na vadāmi.
sn12.18:7.3: Ete te, timbaruka, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti:
sn12.18:8.1: Evaṃ vutte, timbaruko paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.18:8.3: esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
sn12.18:8.4: Upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
